system:
note description: "Multiple widget container accessible as a list." legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." keywords: "widget list, container" date: "$Date: 2013-05-20 16:15:17 -0700 (Mon, 20 May 2013) $" revision: "$Revision: 92557 $"
deferred class ../interface/ev_widget_list.xmlEV_WIDGET_LIST
inherit ../interface/ev_container.xmlEV_CONTAINER undefine ../interface/ev_dynamic_list.xml#f_extendextend, Falseprune_all, Falsefill, Falseput, ../interface/ev_dynamic_list.xml#f_replacereplace, ../interface/ev_dynamic_list.xml#f_itemitem, ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_initializeinitialize, Falseis_equal redefine ../interface/ev_widget_list.xml#f_implementationimplementation, ../interface/ev_widget_list.xml#f_is_in_default_stateis_in_default_state end
../interface/ev_dynamic_list.xmlEV_DYNAMIC_LIST [../interface/ev_widget.xmlEV_WIDGET] rename Falsesequence_put as ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_cl_putcl_put, ../interface/ev_dynamic_list.xml#f_dl_extenddl_extend as ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_cl_extendcl_extend, Falsedl_prune as ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_cl_prunecl_prune export {../interface/ev_widget_list.xmlEV_WIDGET_LIST} ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_changeable_comparison_criterionChangeable_comparison_criterion, Falsecompare_references, Falsecompare_objects, Falseobject_comparison undefine ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_cl_putcl_put, ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_cl_extendcl_extend, ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_cl_prunecl_prune redefine ../interface/ev_widget_list.xml#f_implementationimplementation, ../interface/ev_widget_list.xml#f_is_in_default_stateis_in_default_state end
feature {NONE} -- Contract support
f_is_in_default_state../interface/ev_widget_list.xml#f_is_in_default_stateis_in_default_state: FalseBOOLEAN -- Is Current in its default state? do Result := ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_is_in_default_statePrecursor {../interface/ev_container.xmlEV_CONTAINER} and ../interface/ev_dynamic_list.xml#f_is_in_default_statePrecursor {../interface/ev_dynamic_list.xmlEV_DYNAMIC_LIST} end
feature {../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY, ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Implementation
f_implementation../interface/ev_widget_list.xml#f_implementationimplementation: ../implementation_interface/ev_widget_list_i.xmlEV_WIDGET_LIST_I -- Responsible for interaction with native graphics toolkit.

end -- class ../interface/ev_widget_list.xmlEV_WIDGET_LIST
